Great thing with CS:GO is that it is very mature game. Matches are like chess, with even small actions having huge consequences. This is great aspect to the game when comparing to BF or COD, which are basically rebooted every two years max.  

It's free and the action reminds me of Metal Gear Online, so for me it is awesome and filled with custom content via Workshops. Game has great competitive side to it, so it's even better with friends. 

Few things though... It's packed with players from all around the globe, so you might want to mute everyone by default, unless playing competitive (aka the real deal mode). This can be found from settings easily. Also, due to the competitive side of things, some people take this game super seriously, so you will meet your chad on the field every now and then. But even 1v1 or 2v2 matches with your friends can be so much fun, even when not taking the game that seriously.
